name: script-runner
description: Status bar buttons for package.json scripts with auto-detected package manager support.

scriptRunner.useDynamicScriptParsing.description: Enable dynamic status bar buttons generated from package.json scripts.

scriptRunner.workspaceMode.description: How to handle multi-root workspaces when building buttons: first folder, pick per run, or all folders.

scriptRunner.excludeScripts.description: List of scripts to ignore when generating status bar buttons.

scriptRunner.maxDynamicScriptButtons.description: Maximum number of script buttons shown before collapsing into an overflow menu.

scriptRunner.reuseTerminalForScripts.description: Reuse dedicated terminals per script instead of creating a new terminal each time.

scriptRunner.askBeforeKill.description: Ask for confirmation before stopping a running script when re-running from the status bar.
